page.title: 05An Ecton Schoolgirl's day
page.content: I usually get up around 8 o'clock and, at 8.45a.m. I get a lift to school with a helpful neighbour. After one and a half hours of lessons it is time for Break. I sit and talk to friends or visit the tuck shop for a bag of crisps. After more lessons it is time for dinner, when we can play badminton or tennis, or we can just talk. When the bell rings at home-time, we line up in the hall and when our bus arrives we get on, and, with a great deal of chattering the journey begins. When I get off the bus, I have a half-hour walk down a lane - lovely in the sun, but in the rain or snow....... When I get home I do my homework, read a new library book, go to the Youth Club at Warslow if it is Monday, or just talk with my family.
